fields.name: ConstrainedMaximumCapacity
fields.description: Optional property which must either be set to True or omitted.

fields.name: DoNotRunExtensionsOnOverprovisionedVMs
fields.description: When Overprovision is enabled, extensions are launched only on the requested number of VMs which are finally kept. This property will hence ensure that the extensions do not run on the extra overprovisioned VMs.

fields.name: OrchestrationMode
fields.description: Specifies the orchestration mode for the virtual machine scale set.

fields.name: Overprovision
fields.description: Specifies whether the Virtual Machine Scale Set should be overprovisioned.

fields.name: PlatformFaultDomainCount
fields.description: Fault Domain count for each placement group.

fields.name: PriorityMixPolicy
fields.description: Specifies the desired targets for mixing Spot and Regular priority VMs within the same VMSS Flex instance.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

fields.name: ScaleInPolicy
fields.description: Specifies the policies applied when scaling in Virtual Machines in the Virtual Machine Scale Set.

fields.name: SinglePlacementGroup
fields.description: When true this limits the scale set to a single placement group, of max size 100 virtual machines. NOTE: If singlePlacementGroup is true, it may be modified to false. However, if singlePlacementGroup is false, it may not be modified to true.

fields.name: SpotRestorePolicy
fields.description: Specifies the Spot Restore properties for the virtual machine scale set.

fields.name: TimeCreated
fields.description: Specifies the time at which the Virtual Machine Scale Set resource was created. Minimum api-version: 2021-11-01.

fields.name: UniqueId
fields.description: Specifies the ID which uniquely identifies a Virtual Machine Scale Set.

fields.name: ZoneBalance
fields.description: Whether to force strictly even Virtual Machine distribution cross x-zones in case there is zone outage. zoneBalance property can only be set if the zones property of the scale set contains more than one zone. If there are no zones or only one zone specified, then zoneBalance property should not be set.
